wpResource.content:
March Madness

Get your game face on, because March Madness is right around the corner. Fans will be glued to their TVs and phones throughout the whopping 67 games. Regardless of the outcome of the tournament, now is the time to get your messaging in front of your target audience. TripleLift offers many opportunities within Native, Video, and Display to effectively deliver your message to your target consumers in ways that resonate.

TripleLift Tips

Did you know 84% of US adults use their smartphone while watching TV*? We recommend using our Branded Video and In-Stream products to catch users’ attention on mobile, tablet, and in-app. Are you looking to showcase an upcoming sale or event? Our Native Scroll and Carousel formats let you highlight up to 5 images with custom headline and copy!

*Source: Statista
